summary: The website has a missing meta description, which can negatively impact its visibility in search engine results. Addressing this issue will enhance click-through rates and improve overall SEO performance.

top_issues.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions help search engines understand page content and influence user clicks.
top_issues.evidence: The homepage lacks a meta description, which is crucial for SEO.

recommended_actions.action: Add a meta description to the homepage
Review other pages for missing meta descriptions
Optimize existing meta descriptions for better engagement
Educate team on the importance of meta descriptions

quick_wins: Add a concise meta description to the homepage
Use a meta description template for consistency
